name: ElementDefinition.maxLength
title: ElementDefinition.maxLength
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: Max length for string type data
element.definition: Indicates the maximum length in characters that is permitted to be present in conformant instances and which is expected to be supported by conformant consumers that support the element. ```maxLength``` SHOULD only be used on primitive data types that have a string representation (see [Datatype characteristics](extension-structuredefinition-type-characteristics.html)).
element.comment: Receivers are not required to reject instances that exceed the maximum length.  The full length could be stored.  In some cases, data might be truncated, though truncation should be undertaken with care and an understanding of the consequences of doing so. If not specified, there is no conformance expectation for length support.
